rows.label: tev060701_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060701_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Pisa about Cauldros.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060701_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060701_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Pisa if anything is troubling her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060701_MSG0001
rows.name: We all try to stop Popote from going to Cauldros.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060701_MSG0002
rows.name:
Everyone know this continent have lots of dangerous
critters and very little food.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060701_MSG0003
rows.name: But Popote decide to bring caravan here anyway.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060701_MSG0004
rows.name:
As expected, caravan found no food.
Everyone pushed to brink of starvation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060701_MSG0005
rows.name:
But then, caravan miraculously stumble upon gerrid
that fell into magma and became baked to crisp.
It saved life of caravan![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060701_MSG0006
rows.name:
Never again will Pisa agree to treacherous journey
where survival depends on eating yucky meat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060701_MSG0009
rows.name:
Popote like to talk big, but deep down Popote
is only coward![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060701_MSG0010
rows.name:
Whenever caravan travel around Cauldros,
Popote cling to Pisa and shake like leaf![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060701_MSG0011
rows.name:
And once when blatta spotted us, Popote wet self
like baby! Meh-meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060701_MSG0012
rows.name:
Yet somehow Popote think it okay to act like king
of caravan and give Pisa impossible orders under
threat of tickling.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060701_MSG0013
rows.name:
Elder Nan told Pisa to be aide many long years ago,
so Pisa do what elder say.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060701_MSG0014
rows.name:
But Pisa would really like to file for transfer and start
new NORMAL life...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060701_SEL1011
rows.name: Ask Pisa about the caravan.

rows.label: tev060701_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Pisa about recent developments.

rows.label: tev060701_MSG0015
rows.name:
Meh-meh! Now that Mr. Disaster is out of picture,
caravan business is booming. Pisa too busy to even
stop and think or take bit of Pisa-time![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060701_MSG0016
rows.name:
Old leader used to force caravan to plow through
magma just to save time. Then critters come along
and knock precious cargo into magma. Meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060701_MSG0017
rows.name:
Well, those days are over. Pisa is going to go
AROUND magma, even if it take longer.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060701_MSG0018
rows.name:
Running safe business for cargo and workers and
nopopotamus way more important than saving time![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060701_MSG0023
rows.name: Did friend see fireworks of Pisa? They were perfect![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060701_MSG0024
rows.name:
Elder Nan even sent Pisa thank-you letter.
Sounds like elder is going to whip sense into Popote
back in New LA. Turn Popote into future elder.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060701_MSG0025
rows.name:
In meantime, Pisa going to do everything to keep
caravan safe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060701_MSG0026
rows.name:
And Pisa try not to think too hard about whether elder
actually have any sense to whip into Popote...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060701_MSG0032
rows.name: Caro are nocturnal. Sleep like logs during day.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060701_MSG0033
rows.name:
It is absolutely vital to sneak by caro VERY quietly!
This is strict rule![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060701_MSG0034
rows.name:
But old leader not do that. Old leader walk up to caro
and try to kick caro out of way. Meeeeh...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060701_MSG0035
rows.name:
Thrilling day is key to job fulfillment, leader say!
Leader is big stinking idiot.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060701_MSG0036
rows.name:
Caravan very lucky that situation change before
everyone working here was wiped out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060701_SEL2011
rows.name: Ask Pisa about life in New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060701_SEL2021
rows.name: Ask Pisa about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060701_SEL2031
rows.name: Ask Pisa about life in New LA.

rows.label: tev060701_MSG0027
rows.name: Human drinks are delicious![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060701_MSG0037
rows.name:
Life of Pisa was especially changed by magical elixir
friends call "beer."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060701_MSG0038
rows.name:
Beer so fizzy and fresh! Make Pisa want to say
"Ahh!" after every chug![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060701_MSG0039
rows.name:
Pisa never get to try beer if Pisa stay in Drongo
Caravanâ€”or with any family of elder, for that matter.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060701_MSG0040
rows.name:
Pisa was sad friend choose Pisa at first,
but now understands it was for best.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060701_MSG0028
rows.name: Pisa is furious! Seriously, Pisa have it up to here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060701_MSG0029
rows.name:
Pisa totally done with awful life stuck between pervy
elder and idiot grandson. Whole family ruin things for
Pisa enough already![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060701_MSG0030
rows.name:
From now on, Pisa staying away from caravan and
living life of freedom.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060701_MSG0031
rows.name: No more keeping Pisa down! Pisa only live once![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060701_MSG0041
rows.name: Pisa make lots of different friends in diner.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060701_MSG0042
rows.name: Everyone have interesting story to tell.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060701_MSG0043
rows.name:
Prone overcome sadness to be here... Wrothians stand
by sense of duty... Pisa shrug off bonds of misery...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060701_MSG0044
rows.name:
Pisa never experience any of this if not for friend.
Such are twists and turns of life![ST:wait ]
